name: dissociative
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
medical
  specialized (of a medical condition) involving a feeling of being separate from reality: People with dissociative disorders believe they are different people in different contexts. The crime was committed during one of her dissociative episodes.
(of a drug) making people feel separate from reality: Ketamine is classified as a dissociative drug. The drug has a dissociative effect.

Specific types of drug
a drug that makes people feel separate from reality: Phencyclidine is a member of the group of drugs called dissociatives.
